name: Sports and Fitness
description: Showcasing the diverse aspects of sports and healthy lifestyles, from intense competitions to daily fitness, inspiring people's vitality and passion.

groups.name: Soccer Field
groups.description: The world's most popular competitive sport, emphasizing teamwork and passion.

groups.name: Basketball Showdown
groups.description: Intense confrontations and individual technical displays.

groups.name: Tennis Scene
groups.description: Elegant swings and confrontations, emphasizing physical coordination and strategy.

groups.name: Golf Swing
groups.description: A refined and gentlemanly sport on serene grasslands.

groups.name: Marathon Long Run
groups.description: A great test of endurance and willpower in urban or cross-country races.

groups.name: Competitive Gymnastics
groups.description: The combination of high skills and artistry in events like balance beam and floor exercise.

groups.name: Skiing and Snowboarding
groups.description: Thrilling speed and skill on snow-covered mountains and ski resorts.

groups.name: Ice Sports
groups.description: The beauty and passion of figure skating, ice hockey, and other ice-based sports.

groups.name: Boxing and Martial Arts
groups.description: The ultimate test of strength, speed, and intelligence.

groups.name: Racing
groups.description: Experiencing the thrill of speed in F1, rally racing, and other high-speed competitions.

groups.name: Cycling Competition
groups.description: Endurance and tactics in road, mountain, or track cycling.

groups.name: Swimming and Diving
groups.description: The challenge of physical coordination and control in water sports.

groups.name: Extreme Sports (Skateboarding, Rock Climbing, etc.)
groups.description: Challenging human limits with adventure activities.

groups.name: Gym Training
groups.description: Shaping a healthy physique through equipment, aerobic, and strength training.

groups.name: Yoga and Meditation
groups.description: Uniting body and mind, emphasizing flexibility and breathing control.

groups.name: Dance Performance
groups.description: The artistic and athletic combination of various dance styles, showcasing passion or elegance.

groups.name: Equestrian Competition
groups.description: The harmony and elegant posture of horse and rider.

groups.name: Table Tennis Match
groups.description: The quick reflexes and precise techniques in a fast-paced game.

groups.name: Badminton
groups.description: The light and fast-paced game of shuttlecock flying through the air.

groups.name: Judo and Wrestling
groups.description: Using technique and joint control for close combat.

groups.name: Sailing and Navigation
groups.description: The sailing sport that emphasizes teamwork and wind harnessing.

groups.name: Shooting and Archery
groups.description: A sport that requires a steady mind and focus to hit targets.

groups.name: Cricket and American Football
groups.description: Intense team competitions from the Commonwealth or American sports.

groups.name: Indoor Sports (Bowling, Pool, etc.)
groups.description: Combining entertainment and skill in indoor activities.
